channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sources: AI training startup Mercor eyes $10B+ valuation on $450 million run rate
item.description: The two-year-old startup has been in discussions with investors for a Series C round.

item.title: Researchers Create 3D-Printed Artificial Skin That Allows Blood Circulation
item.description: Swedish researchers have developed two types of 3D bioprinting technology to artificially generate skin containing blood vessels. It could be a breakt...

item.title: This Is the First Time Scientists Have Seen Decisionmaking in a Brain
item.description: Twelve laboratories around the world have joined forces to map neuronal activity in a mouse’s brain as it makes decisions.

item.title: The Story of British Billionaire Mike Lynch’s Tragic Boat Sinking
item.description: WIRED investigates the untimely death of the English tech titan.

item.title: Robinhood embraces copy trading after warning competitors about regulatory risks
item.description: Roughly nine months after suggesting that a young copy trading platform could only operate because it flew "under the radar" of regulators, Robinhood ...

item.title: Apple’s Best New iOS 26 Feature Has Been on Pixel Phones for Years
item.description: The iPhone’s new software screens your calls using machine intelligence. Neat, but Google had the feature first—just like so many other features that ...

item.title: Watch WIRED’s ‘Uncanny Valley’ Live
item.description: Missed Uncanny Valley’s first live show? We spoke with special guest Jack Conte, CEO of Patreon, in San Francisco.

item.title: Help, I have been charmed by the iPhone Air
item.description: Apple's sleek iPhone Air has a powerful processor and large display, but its battery life and camera might be a problem.

item.title: Why SpaceX made a $17B bet on the direct-to-cell market
item.description: The deal is the most aggressive signal yet that SpaceX wants to rule the satellite-to-phone market.

item.title: From mixers to pitch-offs — your brand event belongs at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
item.description: Each Side Event can unlock new opportunities for the hosts: investor deal flow, talent connections, and brand exposure with the startup community.
